homeHeader.title: Bridging The Digital Divide
homeHeader.description: We connects the world’s foremost technology vendors to a diverse set of channel partners to create innovative solutions and deliver services that help achieve specific business outcomes.

homeServices.title: Distribution
homeServices.description: We form the bridge that connects manufacturers and vendors based across the worlds to resellers and retailers based in Bangladesh.

homeServices.title: Professional Service
homeServices.description: We act as an IT advisor to businesses looking to transform the way they operate using the power of technology.

homeServices.title: Managed Service
homeServices.description: We assist businesses in managing their IT systems at the highest level of efficiency using expert teams to ensure no hiccups arise in their operations.

homePartners.title: Partner with us
homePartners.description: We just want our partners to focus on their products and leave it to us to help optimize your markets and profits. With a tried and tested logistics system and an extensive network of resellers across Bangladesh we ensure that your products are always available to your customers. Furthermore, our highly trained team is always available to support the technical needs of your customers so you can concentrate on growing your profitability. Want to make a splash in the Bangladesh market? Then become a partner today.

aboutUs.introDescription: B-Trac Technologies Ltd. connects the world’s foremost technology vendors to a diverse set of channel partners to create innovative solutions and deliver services that help achieve specific business outcomes.

companyMission.title: Vision
companyMission.description: A Dynamic Global Company Driving Stakeholders' Success Through Excellence, Integrity, Humility & People Leadership.

companyMission.title: Mission
companyMission.description: We Are Committed to Enable Our Partners in Achieving Their Business & Digital Goals Through Innovative Solutions & Service Excellence While Ensuring Sustainable Growth & Stakeholders' Value.

products.productTitle: End-to-end technology. Unlimited possibilities.See how we stop at nothing to help drive your business forward.
products.productDescription: Today, every organization needs to be a digital organization; powered by data, running in a multi-cloud world and ready to take on anything. We can help you prepare and create your digital future today.
